    • calculateAmount

      public int calculateAmount(Budget budget)
      Calculate the total amount of transactions related to a budget. 根据预算设置计算相关交易总金额。
      Parameters:
      budget - Budget object / 预算对象
      Returns:
      Total amount of transactions matching the budget criteria (unit: cents) / 符合预算条件的交易总金额（单位：分）
